title: Consensus layer released
description: Initial release of the consensus layer.
Graphs added for 7 metrics and 8 projects.
Metrics: Nakamoto coefficient, Gini coefficient, Shannon entropy, Herfindahl-Hirschman index (HHI), Theil index, Max power ratio, Tau-decentralization index
Projects: Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Cardano, Dogecoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Tezos, Zcash.

title: Tokenomics layer released
description: Initial release of the tokenomics layer.
Graphs added for 7 metrics and 7 projects.
Metrics: Gini coefficient, Shannon entropy, Herfindahl-Hirschman index (HHI), Theil index, Max power ratio, Nakamoto coefficient, Tau-decentralization index
Projects: Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Cardano, Dogecoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Tezos.

title: Software layer released
description: Initial release of the software layer.
Graphs added for 5 metrics and 8 projects.
Metrics: Shannon entropy, Herfindahl-Hirschman index (HHI), Theil index, Max power ratio, Total entities
Projects: Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Cardano, Go-Ethereum (Ethereum), Nethermind (Ethereum), Litecoin, Tezos, Zcash.
Doughnut charts added for the contributor distributions of the 8 projects.

title: PNG exports
description: Added option to export individual charts as PNG files.

title: Homepage
description: Added home page and set it as the dashboard landing page.

title: Cardano tokenomics graphs updated
description: Updated the query used to fetch address balance data for Cardano from BigQuery and updated the relevant tokenomics graphs to reflect the  changes.
